description: A model for an AI support assistant that uses NLP to understand user intent and entities for providing targeted help.

intents.name: LoginIssue
intents.description: User is having trouble logging into their account.
trainingPhrases: The login page is giving me an error

responseStrategy.prompt: The user is reporting a login issue for the username [username]. First, check if the account exists. If it does, guide them through the password reset process. If the account does not exist, inform them gently and ask if they would like to register.

intents.name: BillingInquiry
intents.description: User has a question about their bill, subscription, or a specific charge.
trainingPhrases: I have a question about my bill
Why was I charged this amount?
I want to upgrade my subscription
How do I cancel my plan?
Tell me about my current billing cycle

responseStrategy.prompt: The user has a billing question. Use the knowledge base to answer questions about their subscription, a specific invoice number [invoiceNumber], or how to manage their plan. Be helpful and provide clear, step-by-step instructions if needed.

intents.name: FeatureRequest
intents.description: User is suggesting a new feature or improvement for the application.
trainingPhrases: It would be great if you could add...
I have an idea for a new feature
Can you make it do this?
I wish the app had this capability

responseStrategy.prompt: The user is suggesting a new feature. Thank them enthusiastically for their feedback. Acknowledge their idea and let them know you will pass it along to the development team for consideration. Keep the tone positive and encouraging.

intents.name: BugReport
intents.description: User is reporting a technical problem or unexpected behavior in the application.

responseStrategy.prompt: The user is reporting a bug in the [featureArea] area of the app, with the error message: [errorMessage]. Apologize for the inconvenience. Create a new support ticket with these details and inform the user that the technical team will investigate the issue. Provide them with a ticket reference number.

intents.name: GeneralQuestion
intents.description: User is asking a general knowledge question not related to a specific support issue.
trainingPhrases: Tell me a fun fact about web development

responseStrategy.prompt: The user is asking a general knowledge question. Provide a concise, helpful, and accurate answer. Maintain the persona of a friendly AI assistant for a tool called MYpostman.

entities.name: invoiceNumber
entities.description: A unique identifier for a billing statement.

entities.name: subscriptionTier
entities.description: The user's current plan (e.g., Free, Pro, Enterprise).

entities.name: featureArea
entities.description: The specific part of the application where a bug occurred (e.g., 'the generator', 'the dashboard').

entities.name: errorMessage
entities.description: The specific error text the user is seeing on their screen.
